name: Calhoun v2
details:
Calhoun Mike Campbell Signature Overdrive/Fuzz V2100% discrete components sound and react just like your favorite old tube amp
    Cleans up beautifully with a lighter touch and lower volumes from your guitar
    Can be engaged independent of the pedal’s fuzz circuit
    Tone-Bender-like fuzz recalls the best sounds of the British Invasion
    Bias control goes from smooth fuzz to lo-fi, spitting tones that will cut through any mix
    Adopts a thick and focused lead tone when stacked with the overdrive circuit
https://www.google.com/search?q=Calhoun+v2&oq=Calhoun+v2&aqs=chrome..69i57j0l5.1739j0j1&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8
